commands.name: hello
commands.description: Greet the user that invoke this command.

commands.name: describe
commands.description: Ask Archy to describe the author or the mentioned user.

commands.name: froge
commands.description: Return a random froge emoji available on this server.

commands.name: gif
commands.description: Return the best gif found with the Tenor API.

commands.name: go
commands.description: Send a message from a Golang bot instance.

commands.name: js
commands.description: Send a message from a JS bot instance.

commands.name: help
commands.description: Describe all active commands with example.

commands.name: level
commands.description: Return the level of the author or the mentioned user.

commands.name: levelfaster
commands.description: Return the level of the author or the mentioned user.

commands.name: warn
commands.description:
Admin only: Send a warning by private message to a user.
*Reminder:*
3 warnings -> 24h mute.
5 warnings -> 1 week ban.
10 warnings -> Life ban.

commands.name: listwarn
commands.description: Admin only: List all warn of that server.

commands.name: answer
commands.description: Return a random answer based on the game '8 Ball'.
